name: BluetoothCharacteristicProperties.notify
description: The notify read-only property of the BluetoothCharacteristicProperties interface returns a boolean that is true if notifications of the characteristic value without acknowledgement is permitted.
content:
Draft
This page is not complete.

Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The notify read-only property of the BluetoothCharacteristicProperties interface returns a boolean that is true if notifications of the characteristic value without acknowledgement is permitted.
